channel.title: Mergers and Acquisitions on FinanClub

item.title: PARA
item.description: score:-31 Chances: Paramount Global is making strategic moves to sell its stake in Viacom18, which could indicate a shift in focus towards other areas of the business. The sale of the stake to Reliance Industries for $517 million could provide Paramount Global with additional resources to invest in its core operations.
